Room.Name: Knight's Walk
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a massive stone tunnel, known as the Knight's Walk.
Room.LongDescription: The tunnel continues to the east and west, gradually rising toward the east. Further to the west the Knight's Walk ends, but a hallway appears to continue to the south from there. The stone wall is cold to the touch on both sides of you, and a cool breeze whistles around you. Graffitti covers the north wall.
